Title: Login with valid credentials
Pre-conditions: User account exists (standard_user). Browser opened and navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Test Steps:
1. Enter username 'standard_user'
2. Enter password 'secret_sauce'
3. Click 'Login' button
Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and lands on the Products page (URL contains /inventory.html). Product list is visible.
Author: QA Automation Team

Title: Login with invalid credentials shows error
Pre-conditions: Browser opened and navigated to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Test Steps:
1. Enter username 'locked_out_user'
2. Enter password 'wrong_password'
3. Click 'Login' button
Expected Result: Login fails. Error message displayed: 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service' (or site-specific message). User remains on login page.
Author: QA Automation Team

Title: Add product to cart and complete checkout (happy path)
Pre-conditions: User logged in as 'standard_user' and on Products page.
Test Steps:
1. Click 'Add to cart' on first product
2. Click on cart icon
3. Verify product is listed in cart
4. Click 'Checkout'
5. Enter First Name 'Test', Last Name 'User', Postal Code '12345'
6. Click 'Continue'
7. Click 'Finish'
Test Data:
username: standard_user
password: secret_sauce
FirstName: Test
LastName: User
PostalCode: 12345
Expected Result: Product appears in cart, Checkout Overview shows correct product and price, After 'Finish' user sees 'THANK YOU FOR YOUR ORDER' or completion confirmation and is taken to the order completion page.
Author: QA Automation Team
